mapper.select:
select count (*) over (partition by 1) total_rows, beach_dim.county, beach_dim.beach_seq, beach_dim.beach_name, monitor_site_dim.beach_seq, monitor_site_dim.monitor_site_seq, monitor_site_dim.station_name
from beach_dim join monitor_site_dim ON beach_dim.beach_seq = monitor_site_dim.beach_seq
WHERE beach_dim.historical_flag = 'N' and beach_dim.beach_seq not in (1100,1101) and beach_dim.inland = 'N' and monitor_site_dim.status = 'Y'
